events.comment: Need a way to reference any dialogue file, not just Amy1
The hand fitIntoSlots should reposition the card otherwise
Stash current branch info because the function calls will return blank once the dialogue stops.
Dialogue extension looks should only ever modify the Dialogue.State. Calling changes to the extension itself causes wakness.
Always takes over dialogue state if we have in-progress scrolling. Maybe should just come from "init" state?

parameters: "Enc State: " + VariableString(Encounter.State)  + "; Quality: "  + VariableString(Encounter.MoodQuality) + "; Node Title: " + VariableString(Encounter.Node.Title)

events.comment: If the qualities still match, continue with the current branch.
If the mood quality no longer matches the node's quality, move branches branch to start the transition.
State always updates after all checks.
Need a way to reference any character object, not just Amy1
Verified that the previous works on structure vars
